thread.section_title: California Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Brilliant location. Excellent Staff.
thread.title_full: Brilliant location. Excellent Staff. - Review of California Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: 583seanf
title: Brilliant location. Excellent Staff.
text:
This hotel is fantastically located very close to Termini; the main bus and rail station for Rome. Yet close enough to not be disturbed by the noise or crowds of the station itself.
The rooms are spacious and very clean and are cleaned daily by housekeeping. The hotel offer a very good breakfast with a wide selection of choices.
The only disappointment (and the reason I am scoring 4/5, not 5/5, is that there was no iron in the room and further, no iron in the hotel. We had a week of creased clothes!
Apart from that, a fantastic hotel.
